_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Teamspeak3 Server
author: admin@webdesign-kronberg.de
description: VoIP software designed with security in mind, featuring crystal clear voice quality, endless customization options, and scalabilty up to thousands of simultaneous users.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# TS3 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

echo 'apt-get update ; installing tar and curl'
apt-get update
apt-get install -y tar curl
cd /mnt/server || exit
TSVERSION=$(curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sqall123/teamspeak-egg/master/tsversion)
echo "latest ts3 version: $TSVERSION"
echo 'installing...'
curl https://files.teamspeak-services.com/releases/server/"$TSVERSION"/teamspeak3-server_linux_amd64-"$TSVERSION".tar.bz2 | tar xj --strip-components=1
echo 'accepting license...'
echo '' > .ts3server_license_accepted
echo "$TSVERSION" > version_installed.txt
echo 'downloading startscript...'
curl -H 'Cache-Control: max-age=0' https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sqall123/teamspeak-egg/master/update.sh > update.sh
chmod +x update.sh
echo "" > ts3server.ini
echo "" > version_static.txt
echo "SERVER_VERSION=" > version_static.txt
echo 'finished!'

variables.name: Log Query Commands?
variables.description: log server query commands for audit reasons

variables.description: TCP Port for SSH Server Query

variables.name: Query SSH Key
variables.description: path to ssh key for SSH Server Query

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description: You can set you teamspeak server to a static version using this variable. Please only set this variable if you don't want to use the latest version.
